8184.title: Game Of Thrones
8184.description: AVAILABLE TILL 31ST MARCH. Summers span decades. Winters can last a lifetime. Whilst kingdoms fight each other for the control of Westeros, a sinister force lurks beyond the Wall.

1000034503.title: Bang Bang
1000034503.description: Rajveer sets out to steal the world's most coveted diamond, the Kohinoor, triggering a series of fights, car chases and a revenge plot.

1000053838.title: Baby
1000053838.description: Post 26/11 Mumbai attacks, a special intelligence task force will stop at nothing to foil another such assault on the Indian soil.

1000065771.title: Bodyguard
1000065771.description: A bodyguard falls in love with a woman over the phone, without realising that she is actually the woman he is protecting.

1000213010.title: Taqdeer
1000213010.description: Avinash gets separated from his childhood love Priya. Will fate play its part and bring the two estranged lovers together as grown-ups?

1000213089.title: Baaghi 2
1000213089.description: A tough army officer searches for his ex-lover's child, who is kidnapped under mysterious circumstances. However, his quest is not easy.

1000230994.title: The Return of Abhimanyu
1000230994.description: When money goes missing from Major Kathiravan's account, resulting in a personal tragedy, he decides to track down the hacker behind this.

1000235906.title: Junglee
1000235906.description: Back in his hometown after years, Raj befriends Bhola, an elephant. As time passes, he discovers a deep-rooted poaching scandal, which changes his life forever.

1000239447.title: Indias Most Wanted
1000239447.description: Five ordinary men, one global terrorist, witness India's biggest manhunt operation in this film inspired by true events.

1260022894.title: Special Ops
1260022894.description: One is a relentless hero, the other is a terror mastermind. In a race against time, Himmat Singh and his team are on a mission to end a nineteen-year long manhunt.

1260025583.title: Baaghi 3
1260025583.description: In a twisted turn of events, when a group of deadly terrorists kidnap Ronnie's elder brother in Syria, he sets off on a mission to bring him back.

1260046299.title: Ungalukkaga Oruvan
1260046299.description: When a software company CEO, Rishi, returns to India and reunites with his former classmate, little does he know that things are way worse than they look.

1260071971.title: Special Ops 1.5
1260071971.description: After the 2001 Indian Parliament attack, a young and idealistic R&AW officer had a theory. In 2003, he had a mystery. This is the story of Himmat Singh.

1260101966.title: Price Of Passion
1260101966.description: A doctor witnesses a murder and has to agree to a marriage with a criminal in exchange for her life. Can she endure the undesired marriage and its aftermath?

1260105438.title: Shoorveer
1260105438.description: When an imminent attack threatens India, an elite unit - the Hawks - undertake a mission that will test the limits of their courage and grit.

1260113215.title: Aar Ya Paar
1260113215.description: When the modern world's greed destroys his idyllic tribal existence, a valiant archer becomes a deadly assassin to get even.

1260117917.title: Businessman
1260117917.description: An ambitious Surya arrives in Mumbai with a plan to become the powerful mafia don. But is there more to him than meets the eye?
1260117917.crisp: Some Scenes of Intimacy, Some Violence, Some Mature Content

1260132190.title: Kaduva
1260132190.description: An intense rivalry with IG Joseph lands Kaduva in jail. But when he gets released, the battle for supremacy continues, wherein losing is not an option.

1260132510.title: The Legend
1260132510.description: A sophisticated scholar Saravanan arrives at his native town to serve the people. But chaos ensues when he lands in the crosshairs of medical mafia.

1770016137.title: Baahubali2: The Conclusion
1770016137.description: Why did Kattappa kill Amarendra Baahubali? Unveil the mystery and many more secrets that lie in the depths of the Mahishmati kingdom.
